A US healthcare worker has died after being denied a coronavirus test four times, her daughter has claimed.
Deborah Gatewood was just two years from retiring as a phlebotomist at a Detroit hospital NBC News reports.
However the 63-year-old died on April 17 … [+2710 chars]

articles.title: ‘COVID toes’ is the new symptom of coronavirus - Body and Soul
articles.description: ‘COVID toes’ is the new symptom of coronavirus
articles.content:
Doctors have found another unusual symptom of COVID-19, and it has nothing to do with a cold or fever.Purple or blue toes that are swollen and feel painful to touch is the latest rare symptom of coronavirus, according to health experts.
Dubbed ‘COVID toes’, … [+2335 chars]

articles.author: Ellen Gabler
articles.title: Malaria drug prescriptions surge after Trump praised chloroquine as coronavirus cure - The Independent
articles.description: While medical experts have since stepped up warnings about drugs’ possibly dangerous side effects, they were still being prescribed at more than six times normal rate during second week of April
articles.content:
It was at a midday briefing last month that President Donald Trump first used the White House telecast to promote two anti-malarial drugs in the fight against the coronavirus.
I think it could be something really incredible, Mr Trump said on 19 March, noting… [+9218 chars]
